en.bdb: “O my mother, what should I say? Krishna is forcibly exhibiting his love for her and is sending us to her

transliteration.english: sayaam so maiee kahaa kaheeyai ieh saath kare hitavaa bar joree ||
transliteration.hindi: स्याम सो माई कहा कहीयै इह साथ करे हितवा बर जोरी ॥

en.bdb: Is Krishna short of gopis like her?721.

transliteration.english: kab sayaam pikho ieh gavaiaaran kee mat sayaam ke kop te pai na ddarai ||

transliteration.en: kab sayaam pikho ieh gavaiaaran kee mat sayaam ke kop te pai na ddarai ||

en.bdb: The poet Shyam says that this gopi (Radha) does not fear even slightly from Krishna, he is a sacrifice on her boldness when she says that Krishna be brought before her.722.

en.bdb: “Krishna loves someone else, this gopi has no comprehension about it

transliteration.english: sayaam karai sakhee aaur so preet tabai ieh gavaiaaran bhool pachhaanai ||

transliteration.ipa: səjɑm kəræ səkʰi əoʊr sɔ pɹit̪ t̪əbæ eɪh Gʋɑrən ɓul pəɕɑnæ.

transliteration.english: vaa ke ke'ee bin ree sajanee su rahee keh kai su kahiyo nahee maanai ||
transliteration.hindi: वा के कीए बिनु री सजनी सु रही कहि कै सु कहियो नही मानै ॥
transliteration.en: vaa ke ke'ee bin ree sajanee su rahee keh kai su kahiyo nahee maanai ||
transliteration.hi: वा के कीए बिनु री सजनी सु रही कहि कै सु कहियो नही मानै ॥
transliteration.ipa: ʋɑ ke kiee bɪn ri səd͡ʒəni s rəhi kəh kæ s kəhɪjɔ nəhi mɑnæ.

en.bdb: “When Krishna will forget her, then she will know the reward of such persistence and in the end, feeling embarrassed, she will conciliate him

transliteration.english: yaa ko bisaar ddarai man te tab hee ieh maaneh ko fal jaanai ||
